A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved The Last Jedi. Could it have been better? Yes\, of course\, but  what Rian Johnson is doing is to perpetuate the magic of the franchise beyond its original characters. It'd be boring and predictable to still see Luke\, or Leia or Chewie or Darth Vader n future films. If Star Wars is here to stay\, it needs to reinvent itsfelf.
